title: Disneyland Paris' free meal deals for 2020 could save families hundreds of pounds
text:

Families planning a trip to Disneyland Paris for 2020 could save hundreds of pounds thanks to a brand new Disney Dining offer!

MagicBreaks is currently offering FREE Disney Dining Plans to families who book a package for summer 2020 which includes a stay at either a Disney Hotel or a Disney Nature Resort.

You can choose from four plans depending on what suits your needs; a Free Breakfast Meal Plan, a Free Standard Half Board Meal Plan, a Plus Half Board Meal Plan and a Premium Full Board Meal Plan.

(You can find out what each plan entails below - the plan you can opt for also depends on your chosen hotel).

But that's not all. The offer also includes up to 20 per cent off Hotel and Ticket packages, PLUS €100 Disney Spending money!

The deals are already available to book on the MagicBreaks website - and the free meal plan will be available for your whole party.

If you're planning a trip between the 2nd April to the 2nd July 2020, book by the 29th December 2019. If you're planning a trip between the 3rd July and 1st November 2020, you'll have until the 12th February 2020 to bag the deal.

There are heaps more perks if you book with MagicBreaks too, including a FREE magical call from Mickey Mouse to announce your stay, a FREE Disney Activity Book and 15 per cent off dining at Planet Hollywood and Earl of Sandwich.

The deals could save families significant cash - for example, a standard half board meal plan usually starts from £34.31 per adult and £24.62 per night.

For a family of four (two adults, two children), that would make for a total cost of £117 per night - or £235 for a two night break!

So, what exactly is included in the meal plans? We take a look at everything you need to know for each plan below...

If you're looking for more offers, we've also got a guide to the best Disneyland Paris deals and discounts which are worth being on your radar for both 2019 and 2020 holidays.

(Image: Disneyland Paris)

Disney Dining meal plans explained

We take a look at the four dining plans on offer. If you need more information you can also check out the MagicBreaks website guide here.

This includes a delicious breakfast buffet at your hotel. Staying at Disney's Davy Crockett Ranch? You can collect a breakfast basket from the forest chalet per person, for each night of your stay.

This includes a breakfast buffet at your hotel and one meal (either lunch or dinner) per person, for each night of your stay. You'll have a choice of five buffet restaurants.

This includes a breakfast buffet at your hotel and one meal (either lunch or dinner) per person for each night of your stay - but you can choose from over 15 buffet and table service restaurants.

This includes breakfast at your Disney hotel and two meal vouchers per person, per night of stay, to use for lunch and dinner.

The Premium plan means you'll have the choice of over 20 buffet and table service restaurants, but the best bit is that the vouchers can also be used for breakfast or lunch with the Disney Characters, Princess Lunch and Buffalo Bill's Wild West Show...with Mickey and friends!
description: Disneyland Paris has launched free Disney Dining plans for summer 2020 and it could save families hundreds of pounds
